p: Comparing the area under the curve for the inhibitory effect of 100 and 300 mg/kg EOHc, the inhibition induced by these doses was, respectively, 34.51±5.19 and 40.37±3.58% for histamine ( Figure 4D), 34.42±6.69 and 44.49±4.76% for serotonin ( Figure 4E), and 43.66±12.74 and 52.51±1.87% for bradykinin effect ( Figure 4F).
